segments.text: Good morning . Can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good morning . I'd like to make a reservation to Guangzhou for August 2 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Just a moment , please . I'm sorry , sir . There is no ticket available on that day . But we have flights for Guangzhou the next day .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: May I inquire about the departure time ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: A 9:12 flight in the morning and a 14:00 flight in the afternoon .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When will the plane reach for the morning flight ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . I'd like to book a ticket for this one .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right , sir . Please reconfirm your ticket no later than 12 o'clock two days before the flight ; otherwise , your reservation will automatically be cancelled .
segments.speaker: S1
